verses.verse: And the word<WH1697> of Jehovah<WH3068> came unto me<WH559>, saying,
Son <WH1121> of man<WH120>, put forth<WH2330> a riddle<WH2420>, and speak<WH4911> a parable<WH4912> unto the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478>;

and say<WH559>, Thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069>: A great<WH1419> eagle<WH5404> with great<WH1419> wings<WH3671> and long pinions<WH83>, full<WH4392> of feathers<WH5133>, which had divers colors<WH7553>, came<WH935> unto Lebanon<WH3844>, and took<WH3947> the top<WH6788> of the cedar<WH730>:
he cropped off<WH6998> the topmost<WH7218> of the young twigs<WH3242> thereof<WH935>, and carried it unto a land<WH776> of traffic<WH3667>; he set<WH7760> it in a city<WH5892> of merchants<WH7402>.

He took<WH3947> also of the seed<WH2233> of the land<WH776>, and planted<WH5414> it in a fruitful<WH2233> soil<WH7704>; he placed<WH3947> it beside many<WH7227> waters<WH4325>; he set<WH7760> it as a willow-tree<WH6851>.

And it grew<WH6779>, and became a spreading<WH5628> vine<WH1612> of low<WH8217> stature<WH6967>, whose branches<WH1808> turned<WH6437> toward him<WH8328>, and the roots thereof were under him<WH1612>: so it became a vine, and brought forth<WH6213> branches<WH905>, and shot<WH7971> forth sprigs<WH6288>.

There was also another<WH259> great<WH1419> eagle<WH5404> with great<WH1419> wings<WH3671> and many<WH7227> feathers<WH5133>: and<WH1612>, behold, this vine did bend<WH3719> its roots<WH8328> toward him<WH7971>, and shot forth its branches<WH1808> toward him<WH6170>, from the beds of its plantation<WH4302>, that he might water it<WH8248>.

It was planted<WH8362> in a good<WH2896> soil<WH7704> by many<WH7227> waters<WH4325>, that it might bring forth<WH6213> branches<WH6057>, and that it might bear<WH5375> fruit<WH6529>, that it might be a goodly<WH155> vine<WH1612>.

Say <WH559> thou<WH559>, Thus saith the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069>: Shall it prosper<WH6743>? shall he not pull up<WH5423> the roots<WH8328> thereof<WH7082>, and cut off the fruit<WH6529> thereof<WH3001>, that it may wither; that all its fresh springing<WH6780> leaves<WH2964> may wither<WH3001>? and not by a strong<WH1419> arm<WH2220> or much<WH7227> people<WH5971> can it be raised<WH5375> from the roots thereof<WH8328>.

Yea <WH8362>, behold, being planted, shall it prosper<WH6743>? shall it not utterly<WH3001> wither<WH3001>, when the east<WH6921> wind<WH7307> toucheth<WH5060> it<WH3001>? it shall wither in the beds<WH6170> where it grew<WH6780>.
Moreover the word<WH1697> of Jehovah<WH3068> came unto me<WH559>, saying,

Say <WH559> now to the rebellious<WH4805> house<WH1004>, Know<WH3045> ye not what these things mean<WH559>? tell them<WH4428>, Behold, the king of Babylon<WH894> came<WH935> to Jerusalem<WH3389>, and took<WH3947> the king<WH4428> thereof<WH8269>, and the princes thereof<WH935>, and brought them to him to Babylon<WH894>:

and he took<WH3947> of the seed<WH2233> royal<WH4410>, and made<WH3772> a covenant<WH1285> with him<WH935>; he also brought him under an oath<WH423>, and took<WH935> away the mighty<WH352> of the land<WH776>;
that the kingdom<WH4467> might be base<WH8217>, that it might not lift itself up<WH5375>, but that by keeping<WH8104> his covenant<WH1285> it might stand<WH5975>.

But he rebelled<WH4775> against him in sending<WH7971> his ambassadors<WH4397> into Egypt<WH4714>, that they might give<WH5414> him horses<WH5483> and much<WH7227> people<WH5971>. Shall he prosper<WH6743>? shall he escape<WH4422> that doeth<WH6213> such things<WH6565>? shall he break the covenant<WH1285>, and yet escape<WH4422>?

As I live<WH2416>, saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069>, surely in the place<WH4725> where the king<WH4428> dwelleth that made him king<WH4427>, whose oath<WH423> he despised<WH959>, and whose covenant<WH1285> he brake<WH6565>, even with him in the midst<WH8432> of Babylon<WH894> he shall die<WH4191>.

Neither shall Pharaoh<WH6547> with his mighty<WH1419> army<WH2428> and great<WH7227> company<WH6951> help<WH6213> him in the war<WH4421>, when they cast up<WH8210> mounds<WH5550> and build<WH1129> forts<WH1785>, to cut off<WH3772> many<WH7227> persons<WH5315>.

For he hath despised<WH959> the oath<WH423> by breaking<WH6565> the covenant<WH1285>; and behold<WH5414>, he had given his hand<WH3027>, and yet hath done<WH6213> all these things<WH4422>; he shall not escape.

Therefore thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069>: As I live<WH2416>, surely mine oath<WH423> that he hath despised<WH959>, and my covenant<WH1285> that he hath broken<WH6331>, I will even bring<WH5414> it upon his own head<WH7218>.

And I will spread<WH6566> my net<WH7568> upon him<WH8610>, and he shall be taken in my snare<WH4686>, and I will bring<WH935> him to Babylon<WH894>, and will enter into judgment<WH8199> with him there for his trespass<WH4603> that he hath trespassed against me<WH4604>.

And all his fugitives<WH4015> in all his bands<WH102> shall fall<WH5307> by the sword<WH2719>, and they that remain<WH7604> shall be scattered<WH6566> toward every wind<WH7307>: and ye shall know<WH3045> that I<WH3068>, Jehovah, have spoken it<WH1696>.

Thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069>: I will also take<WH3947> of the lofty<WH7311> top<WH6788> of the cedar<WH730>, and will set<WH5414> it<WH6998>; I will crop off from the topmost<WH7218> of its young twigs<WH3127> a tender one<WH7390>, and I will plant<WH8362> it upon a high<WH1364> and lofty<WH8524> mountain<WH2022>:

in the mountain<WH2022> of the height<WH4791> of Israel<WH3478> will I plant<WH8362> it<WH5375>; and it shall bring forth boughs<WH6057>, and bear<WH6213> fruit<WH6529>, and be a goodly<WH117> cedar<WH730>: and under it shall dwell<WH7931> all birds<WH6833> of every wing<WH3671>; in the shade<WH6738> of the branches<WH1808> thereof shall they dwell<WH7931>.

And all the trees<WH6086> of the field<WH7704> shall know<WH3045> that I<WH3068>, Jehovah, have brought down<WH8213> the high<WH1364> tree<WH6086>, have exalted<WH1361> the low<WH8217> tree<WH6086>, have dried<WH3001> up the green<WH3892> tree<WH6086>, and have made the dry<WH3002> tree<WH6086> to flourish<WH6524>; I<WH3068>, Jehovah, have spoken<WH1696> and have done it<WH6213>.
